TopicTitle: *Redundant Thread - Do Not Use* KW Rocketry Update

Articles.Content:
Seen as Kickasskyle and Winston have been away for some time now; and that the official KWRocketry thread has been removed; I took it upon myself to update the pack to be compatible with 0.20.

I should stress that I am not a part of the KW team, and if Kickasskyle or Winston return to KSP then this thread will most likely be removed.

Feel free to report any bugs.

DOWNLOAD

*REMOVED*

Edited May 31, 2013 by lpam

Just as I made a "Modification" to KW...

Thanks, nevertheless

You're a savior! Now if NovaPunch had a .20 release, I'd be in heaven.

Okay, so whenever I install KW rocketry in any form, it screws up the textures and messes with the game in general. This only happened since 0.20.1.

Am I alone in this?

Okay, so whenever I install KW rocketry in any form, it screws up the textures and messes with the game in general. This only happened since 0.20.1.

0.20.1 has a bug involving mod textures. I'm surprised you were even able to start KSP.... That's almost certainly the cause of your problem. They're working on a hotfix.

Edited May 30, 2013 by lpam

And that update, for some reason, has the missing scale problem fixed, but is not 0.20 directory structure compliant...

What would make it so?

What would make it so?

  1. Moving things to make them install into GameData/KWRocketry/Parts/..... structuring it like Squad did theirs, and informing users of the change.
  2. Fixing the part.cfg files to have PART{...} outer bracket level. (Otherwise, they won't load from GameData)
  3. Ensuring that all parts that are rescales of each other, if any, use the same model and texture file and save memory. (which is what PART{...} syntax enables)

See this thread for full details.

Seems Winston has made KW compatible, this thread will be removed tonight.
